pullrequest.title: Feature system part 4.5: use gz11 deps and update gtest

content.raw:
it's happening to all our gz11 branches; we discussed it a bit here:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/268/fix-compilation-using-gcc8-and-add-support/diff#comment-66512565

it seems that lcov is not excluding files properly; it's marking most of our gtest fork as uncovered code, when these files should not be considered at all
content.html:
it's happening to all our gz11 branches; we discussed it a bit here:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/268/fix-compilation-using-gcc8-and-add-support/diff#comment-66512565

it seems that lcov is not excluding files properly; it's marking most of our gtest fork as uncovered code, when these files should not be considered at all
